casebody.data:
Doris TUCKER, in Her Capacity as Administrator of The Estate of Mary Ellen Thompson, Plaintiff,
v.
The CLERK OF COURT OF FORSYTH COUNTY, EX REL Susan FRYE ; Bryan Thompson; Fred P. Flynt, III; William M. Speaks, Jr.; Liberty Mutual Group, Inc. (Formerly Known as Ohio Casualty Insurance Co.); Clinard Insurance Group, Inc. ; and Dudley Witt, Defendants. No. COA16-926 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: June 20, 2017

DISMISSED.
